table-entry.name: TASK
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key, name varchar(200), mainTask varchar(200), desp varchar(200), params varchar(3000), nextTask varchar(200), running boolean default false, status integer default 0, cron varchar(200) default '0 0 0/1 * * ?', createBy varchar(100), updateBy varchar(100), createTime timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updateTime timestamp

table-entry.name: TASK_LOG
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key, task_id varchar(200), status integer default 0, error varchar(1000), startTime timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, endTime timestamp

table-entry.name: TASK_ERROR_LOG
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key, task_log_id varchar(200), error varchar(1000), createTime timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

table-entry.name: SYS_CONFIG
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key, admin_username varchar(200), admin_password varchar(200), mail_server_name varchar(255), mail_server_port integer, mail_user_email varchar(1024), mail_user_password varchar(1024), mail_ssl_enabled boolean, task_file_path varchar(255), log_path varchar(255), db_path varchar(255), control_server varchar(255), minite_error_limit integer, running_limit integer

table-entry.name: SYS_USER
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key, username varchar(100), password varchar(100), nick varchar(200), phone varchar(50), mail varchar(100), locking boolean default false, createBy varchar(100), updateBy varchar(100), createTime timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updateTime timestamp
